content.raw:
Is there any way to tell how many hours we have used?

My first four attempts were futile.  The first one I thought I had clicked on start too soon.  My second (and probably first) I used the wrong format for the key.  Hint - the -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- and   -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY----- are required.  You can't just copy the key.  The third and fourth attempts just sat there and never gave an IP address.  The fifth attempt appears to finally be building the image.  We will see how it does.
content.html:
Is there any way to tell how many hours we have used?

My first four attempts were futile. The first one I thought I had clicked on start too soon. My second (and probably first) I used the wrong format for the key. Hint - the -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- and -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY----- are required. You can't just copy the key. The third and fourth attempts just sat there and never gave an IP address. The fifth attempt appears to finally be building the image. We will see how it does.
